◆Starly
You were hurt pretty bad though...
You ok?
af838654d1aa5967:
◆Mattel
I'm fine, yes! I just couldn't sit idly
by as the Great Hero does his best
to save the kingdom!
9e1888acf95b722e:
◆Moe
Ho-hold your horses miss... When
you say "Great Hero"... You don't
mean...
ab85848ac17d5d6b:
◆Mattel
I'm referring to Mr. Starfy, of course!
His heroic deeds are known far and
wide throughout the Amiy Kingdom!
bc889893e06df43d:
◆Moe
Uh... Listen, miss... You can't believe
every rumor ya hear...
be84848996706f3f:
◆Moe
This guy ain't all that great...
He even forgot all the Abilities
he learned up 'til now...
8f869053c73c673c:
◆Mattel
That just can't be true! Mr. Starfy
is a hero, after all!
ab069439e8c26f79:
◆Starly
That's right! My big bro's a legendary
hero!
ae818554d82d727f:
◆Starly
He can prove it too! He'll Glide
through the air and bring back
some treasure!
9f08c00733e83efb:
◆Moe
Wha-!? Are you outta your mind!?
ae868859e096777a:
◆Starly
*whisper* Look at those pure eyes
of hers... She really believes in big
bro...
ab828c91d62e726f:
◆Starly
If she knew that big bro was just
some clumsy, weak, snot-nosed
kid, she'd be devastated!
af948c29d066f26b:
◆Moe
*whisper*...You're right... I'd feel bad
for her if she found out Starfy was
just some wimpy kid...
bb809418ccb7697d:
◆Moe
Alright, Mr. Hero! Go bring back
that treasure! It should be a
piece of cake for you, right?
8f07944c62b33b6e:
◆Starly
Yeah, big bro! Show Mattel how cool
you are!
a68c914ac8b56e7e:
◆Starly
*whisper*... Just in case, we'll put
up a Glide sign for ya.
b706c8889967363f:
◆Starly
Use it to remember how to Glide!
And make sure you do it the right
way, okay!?
aa49b5c6ceb6d070:
Master the Glide Ability and nab the
treasure! Let's show Mattel how reliable
Starfy is!
b64698a7635a6635:
◆Starly
Use your awesome Glide ability to
grab that treasure!
af0c8090b16d6ff3:
◆Moe
Don't you dare say you can't do it,
Starfy!
af888c92d06df13e:
◆Moe
Hello, cute ladies of the world!
It's so nice to see you all again!
ab90940cf867536f:
◆Moe
I, the Great and Powerful Moe,
will now begin my lecture on
navigating the City Screen!
b70c9898d8696737:
◆Moe
Make sure to pay close attention. And
for our smart friends out there who
already know this stuff...
af988444d82b7a6f:
◆Moe
Press the Start Button to skip the
lecture and jump right into the game.
As for everyone else, listen up!
af9880bcd043db6d:
◆Moe
First off, if you see an "!", it means
that something's really important.
Make sure not to overlook it, ok?
be8891a1e03ece37:
◆Moe
Use the bottom screen to touch
the icon with an "!" over it! Press the
ⓑ Button when you're done.
ae8098b4946bf37c:
◆Moe
You followed my directions exactly!
You're a natural!
9f888098c8377d77:
◆Moe
This is a Character Icon. Touch one
or use the D-Pad to move the cursor
to them and press Ⓐ...
a61c990c60f376fc:
◆Moe
And then you can talk to these guys.
ad009ee0e01f717f:
◆Moe
You see the "!" over the Character
Icon, right?
bf908489c176786f:
◆Moe
Whenever you see that, it means
they've got something really
important to say.
af8894a2ca3d6a6b:
◆Moe
For example, if you do a favor for
these guys, they might thank ya by
givin' you some treasure...
9f009c92f06d633f:
◆Moe
Or they might give you some helpful
hints for your adventure.
ab9085389863fa6f:
◆Moe
Either way, make sure to talk to
anyone with an "!" over their head!
af609bd46a97d00d:
This Ability'll let ya easily reach places
a regular jump couldn't! Make sure you
remember this, Big Bro!

                  : Slowmotion                     : Back
b30bc8ee268f9133:
You got a Heart Gem!
Your Max HP increased by 10!
bf0c9890c43dec37:
◆Moe
What's that? There's a door ya
can't open? Sounds like it's locked
to me.
ae14908b817b5c7f:
◆Moe
Can you see if any marks are on the
door? Uh huh... So there's a Spade,
Diamond, Club, and Heart shape on it...
ae10981e946bf967:
◆Moe
Alright, there should be matching
marks around there somewhere.
Look for 'em and spin into 'em.
bf92840cc834f37b:
◆Moe
There are probably some fakes lyin'
around too, so make sure you Star
Spin into the right shapes.
ae859018c16ee57f:
◆Moe
Look for the same symbols that are on the door. Find the Spade, Diamond, Club and Heart marks and spin into them.
9e848158d83ef74e:
◆Moe
That should open the door!
Some of them might be fakes though, so be careful!
ae0c94b3c2357c7a:
◆Moe
What's your problem? You bored or something? Or do you really want to hear all about my screw-ups?
8f1c84893a95747f:
◆Moe
Careful, falling for me can get you burned. Guess I'm a real heartbreaker...
Heh.
ad2de79610e9e918:
You got a Treasure Chest!
Head back to the City and show Mattel!
a6b4179d4e539d0a:
Warp to the Warp Jizou King?
WARP           [DON'T]
a7b0179d6e13d80b:
Warp to the Warp Jizou King?

8f0794184ae6677b:
◆Starly
Oh, you're back! Didja bring back
the treasure, Big Bro?
a786814bda24f66b:
◆Mattel
That's amazing! Mr. Starfy truly
is the great hero I thought he was!
ad00960f68f5617f:
◆Moe
Yeah, I dunno about all that...
In any case, ya did good, Starf!
